name: INSearchCallHistoryIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for searching the user’s call history.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveCallTypes(for: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, with: (INCallRecordTypeOptionsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the search criteria for the call type.

items.name: func resolveCallType(for: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, with: (INCallRecordTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the search criteria for the call type.

items.name: func resolveRecipient(for: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, with: (INPersonResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the search criteria for the recipients.

items.name: func resolveDateCreated(for: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the range of dates for the search.

items.name: func resolveUnseen(for: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can search for calls that the user hasn’t yet seen.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, completion: (INSearchCallHistoryIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can perform the search.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, completion: (INSearchCallHistoryIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles searching the user’s call history.
